text:
Ann-Britt Ryd Pettersson, born 19 March 1954, is a Swedish news reporter at Sveriges Television. She begun working for SR Blekinge by the late 1970s. She then became host for regional news programme "Östnytt". In 1980, she became first female employed by the SVT sports section.
She was awarded the special prize during the 2018 Kristallen Awards.
